function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordination between public health authorities and governments","Impact":"Slower response to the pandemic, potential for increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels and protocols for information sharing, coordination, and decision-making","Technologies":"Communication and collaboration platforms, data-sharing systems","People":"Public health authorities, governments","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Delay in equipment sharing and resource allocation","Impact":"Shortage of essential medical equipment and resources, potential for inability to control disease spread","Mitigation":"Centralize coordination of equipment distribution, establish emergency stockpiles, implement rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, supply chain automation, emergency procurement systems","People":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities","Owner":"Regional health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Unplanned emergency response and lack of preparedness","Impact":"Inability to effectively respond to a pandemic, heightened risk of uncontrolled outbreaks","Mitigation":"Develop and regularly update national and regional pandemic preparedness plans, conduct regular drills and simulations, invest in healthcare infrastructure and resources","Technologies":"Pandemic preparedness software, simulation tools, healthcare infrastructure management systems","People":"Public health authorities, emergency response agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations"}]}
